title: SKIN CONCEPT: GREMLIN GNAR (already made it, Riot just has to take it)

embed.title: Gnar Skin: Custom Skin created by The Dyr. This skin is rated: Unknown
embed.description: Gnar Skin: Custom Skin created by The Dyr. This skin is rated: Unknown

body:
I made a custom skin for Gnar based on the Gremlins from the film Gremlins (1984).
I think Gnar and the Gremlins are pretty simular at some point. Gremlin Gnar is already
avaible as custom skin on leaguecraft, but if Riot would take it and make it official
that would be awesome. You may click on the link to look and/or download the Gremlin Gnar and install it with SIU.
(cause let's be honest, the last thing Gnar is, is a ~~gentleman~~ :D)

replies.body: Fühl dich nich kopiert, fühl dich geehrt{{champion:150}}
btw. The third picture shows him from his best site
